title: OWASP
content:
Broken Access Control
User can use or edit others data outside scope

Cryptographic Failures
Can access directly to user credentials like password or payment information

Injection
User input be executed directly by database ( mysql v.v ... )

Insecure Design
Application is designed without any secure or without any scenario or without any handling exception case

Security Misconfiguration
This case is because of missing configuration for handling attack case or using default value for credientals

Vulnerable and Outdated Components
Using outdate component or lib

Identification and Authentication Failures
Attacker can get the credientials because of weak auth or using default value for credientials

Software and Data Integrity Failures
Same of outdated and vulnerable. Application using insecure lib or source code that including malware

Security Logging and Monitoring Failures
Missing information of logging and monitoring system

Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
Attacker pretend a real application request by cookies or somethings else and attach to server
